feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.74
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for batch DB
  • Updated translations
  • Fixes for Storing Transactions
  • Handle bulk updates on recurring invoices
  • Improve rate limiting
  • Updated lock file
  • Return early if webhook payload is not appropriate by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10951
  • v5.11.74 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10969

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.73...v5.11.74

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.75
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Disable elastic queues by default
  • v5.11.75 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10971

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.74...v5.11.75

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.76
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Patch for disabling elastic search
  • v5.11.76 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10972

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.75...v5.11.76

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.77
New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.78
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updated lang files
  • Updates for cloudflare services credentials
  • Minor fixes for exchange rates
  • Adjustments for prepayment with underpayments
  • [ Feature ] Authorize.net eCheck
  • Updates for webhook urls being displayed in the UI
  • Fixes for subscription cancellations

  • Updates for hosted account confirmation emails

  • New Flutter admin portal UI, release notes can be found here: https://github.com/invoiceninja/admin-portal/releases/tag/v5.0.173

  • v5.11.78 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10986

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.77...v5.11.78
